sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHIP, a general name for all large vessels, particularly those equipped with three masts and a bowsprit ; the masts being composed of a lower mast, top-mast, and top-gallant- mast, and each of these being provided with yards, sails, and the like. Ships, in general, are either employed for war or merchandise.
